headline: ANORAD PRECISION X-Y-Z INSPECTION MEASUREMENT SYSTEM
description: Precision X-Y-Z Inspection Measurement System     System mounted on granite table

specstable:
Manufacturer Anorad
Model IBM6225
Description Precision X-Y-Z Inspection Measurment System
Accessories Dolan Jenner fiber optic light source
Hitachi camera
Crosshair generator
Javlin nine inch monitor
Other Information Mitutoyo microscope
  • Eye pieces: Wf 10X/24
  • Objective: M Plan APO5 F=200
    Quadra-Check 3000 Series Microprocessor based digital readout
    Model QC3210-AR
  • High measurement speed
  • Video display w/on screen help
  • All multipoint features, up to 50 points each
  • Versatile absolute datum settings
  • Supports many types of probes
  • Version 4.09 software
    X-Y Stage:
  • Linear motors
  • Linear encoders
  • Twelve inch travel both axis
  • Velocity: 10" per sec.
  • Resolution: .0000312"
  • Ten lbs. load capacity
Power Requirements 110/120 V 20.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
